posts.post_content:
Have been looking for a nice T205 Walter Johnson for my collection for some time.

I know there are several on auction right now, but hoping I can give my money to someone here instead of the auction house.

Preferably looking for PSA or SGC in the 3-5 grade range.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Let me know!
